abstract.value: The Time Inc. <title render="italic">Time</title> Covers contains a chronological run of detached covers.

p.value: Open to qualified researchers. Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use.
This record group should be cited as Time Inc. <title render="italic">Time</title> Covers, MS 3009-RG 32, New-York Historical Society.

<title render="italic">Time</title> Covers contains a collection of covers removed from the rest of the magazine dating from 1923 through July 2015. Later dates sometimes include the entire magazine. This is a collection created by the Time Inc. Library and Archives.

subject.value: Corporate libraries -- New York (State)  -- New York.
Publishers and publishing -- New York (State)  -- New York.
